dialogues.text: You approach what looks to be a train station
Heyyy Glorie, wassup! Who's you're friend?
Hellooo! This is Melanie, she came by for a tour & to learn about our systems and quirks.
Yes! I'm human. Weird I know, but let's not get too shambled on the specifics ^W^
Well, now I've seen everything. Anyways, your here to learn right? I could use some extra hands right now, I can already feel my calouses waking.
As Glorie has probably told you, this is the Electron Transport Chain, the main powerplant of the cell. Here's where we produce most of the ATP.
And the final step of Cellular Respiration!
Mhm. Anyways kid, why don't you start with that booth right there? Just collect enough the protons from the passengers then let them pass. Simple enough right?
